</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="335"></td>
        <td id="LC335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">killed. . . he couldn’t kill a little boy? It’s just astounding. . . of all the things to stop him. . . but </td>

        <td id="L336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="336"></td>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="338"></td>
        <td id="LC338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We can only guess.” said Dumbledore. “We may never know.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="339"></td>
        <td id="LC339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="340"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="432"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="433"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="434"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="435"></td>
        <td id="LC435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Shhh!” hissed Professor McGonagall, “You’ll wake the Muggles!” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="436"></td>

        <td id="LC437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“S-s-sorry,” sobbed Hagrid, taking out a large, spotted handkerchief and burying his face in it. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="438"></td>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="489"></td>
        <td id="LC489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Vanishing Glass </td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="491"></td>
        <td id="LC491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nearly ten years had passed since the Dursleys had woken up to find their nephew on the front </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="492"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="493"></td>
        <td id="LC493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lit up the brass number four on the Dursleys’ front door; it crept into their living room, which </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="494"></td>
        <td id="LC494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was almost exactly the same as it had been on the night when Mr. Dursley had seen that fateful </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="495"></td>
        <td id="LC495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">news report about the owls. Only the photographs on the mantelpiece really showed how much </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="496"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="501"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="502"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="508"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="523"></td>
        <td id="LC523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry groaned. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="524"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="526"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="529"></td>
        <td id="LC529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dudley’s birthday — how could he have forgotten? Harry got slowly out of bed and started </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="530"></td>
        <td id="LC530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looking for socks. He found a pair under his bed and, after pulling a spider off one of them, put </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="531"></td>
        <td id="LC531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them on. Harry was used to spiders, because the cupboard under the stairs was full of them, and </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="532"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="535"></td>
        <td id="LC535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that was where he slept. </td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="536"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="537"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="538"></td>
        <td id="LC538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When he was dressed he went down the hall into the kitchen. The table was almost hidden </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="539"></td>
        <td id="LC539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beneath all Dudley’s birthday presents. It looked as though Dudley had gotten the new computer </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="540"></td>
        <td id="LC540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he wanted, not to mention the second television and the racing bike. Exactly why Dudley wanted </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="541"></td>
        <td id="LC541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a racing bike was a mystery to Harry, as Dudley was very fat and hated exercise — unless of </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="542"></td>
        <td id="LC542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">course it involved punching somebody. Dudley’s favorite punching bag was Harry, but he </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="543"></td>
        <td id="LC543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">couldn’t often catch him. Harry didn’t look it, but he was very fast. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="544"></td>
        <td id="LC544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="545"></td>
        <td id="LC545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Perhaps it had something to do with living in a dark cupboard, but Harry had always been small </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="546"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="547"></td>
        <td id="LC547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had to wear were old clothes of Dudley’s, and Dudley was about four times bigger than he was. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="548"></td>
        <td id="LC548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry had a thin face, knobbly knees, black hair, and bright green eyes. He wore round glasses </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="549"></td>
        <td id="LC549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">held together with a lot of Scotch tape because of all the times Dudley had punched him on the </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="550"></td>
        <td id="LC550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nose. The only thing Harry liked about his own appearance was a very thin scar on his forehead </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="551"></td>
        <td id="LC551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that was shaped like a bolt of lightning. He had had it as long as he could remember, and the first </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="552"></td>
        <td id="LC552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">question he could ever remember asking his Aunt Petunia was how he had gotten it. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="553"></td>
        <td id="LC553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="554"></td>
        <td id="LC554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“In the car crash when your parents died,” she had said. “And don’t ask questions.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="555"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="556"></td>
        <td id="LC556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Don ’t ask questions — that was the first rule for a quiet life with the Dursleys. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="557"></td>
        <td id="LC557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="558"></td>
        <td id="LC558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Uncle Vernon entered the kitchen as Harry was turning over the bacon. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="559"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="560"></td>
        <td id="LC560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Comb your hair!” he barked, by way of a morning greeting. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="561"></td>
        <td id="LC561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="562"></td>
        <td id="LC562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">About once a week, Uncle Vernon looked over the top of his newspaper and shouted that Harry </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="563"></td>
        <td id="LC563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">needed a haircut. Harry must have had more haircuts than the rest of the boys in his class put </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="564"></td>
        <td id="LC564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">together, but it made no difference, his hair simply grew that way — all over the place. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="565"></td>
        <td id="LC565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="566"></td>
        <td id="LC566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry was frying eggs by the time Dudley arrived in the kitchen with his mother. Dudley looked </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="567"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="569"></td>
        <td id="LC569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looked like a baby angel — Harry often said that Dudley looked like a pig in a wig. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="570"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="571"></td>
        <td id="LC571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry put the plates of egg and bacon on the table, which was difficult as there wasn’t much </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="572"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="573"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="574"></td>
        <td id="LC574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Thirty-six,” he said, looking up at his mother and father. “That’s two less than last year.” </td>
      </tr>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="577"></td>
        <td id="LC577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mummy and Daddy.” </td>

        <td id="L578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="578"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“All right, thirty-seven then,” said Dudley, going red in the face. Harry, who could see a huge </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="580"></td>
        <td id="LC580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dudley tantrum coming on, began wolfing down his bacon as fast as possible in case Dudley </td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="592"></td>
        <td id="LC592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Thirty-nine, sweetums,” said Aunt Petunia. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="593"></td>
        <td id="LC593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="594"></td>
        <td id="LC594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh.” Dudley sat down heavily and grabbed the nearest parcel. “All right then.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="595"></td>
        <td id="LC595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="596"></td>
        <td id="LC596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Uncle Vernon chuckled. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="597"></td>
        <td id="LC597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="598"></td>
        <td id="LC598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Little tyke wants his money’s worth, just like his father. ’Atta boy, Dudley!” He ruffled </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="599"></td>
        <td id="LC599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dudley’s hair. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="600"></td>
        <td id="LC600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="601"></td>
        <td id="LC601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At that moment the telephone rang and Aunt Petunia went to answer it while Harry and Uncle </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="602"></td>
        <td id="LC602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Vernon watched Dudley unwrap the racing bike, a video camera, a remote control airplane, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="603"></td>
        <td id="LC603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sixteen new computer games, and a VCR. He was ripping the paper off a gold wristwatch when </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="604"></td>
        <td id="LC604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Aunt Petunia came back from the telephone looking both angry and worried. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="605"></td>
        <td id="LC605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="606"></td>
        <td id="LC606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Bad news, Vernon,” she said. “Mrs. Figg’s broken her leg. She can’t take him.” She jerked her </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="607"></td>
        <td id="LC607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">head in Harry’s direction. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="608"></td>
        <td id="LC608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="609"></td>
        <td id="LC609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dudley’s mouth fell open in horror, but Harry’s heart gave a leap. Every year on Dudley’s </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="610"></td>
        <td id="LC610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">birthday, his parents took him and a friend out for the day, to adventure parks, hamburger </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="611"></td>
        <td id="LC611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">restaurants, or the movies. Every year, Harry was left behind with Mrs. Figg, a mad old lady who </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="612"></td>
        <td id="LC612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lived two streets away. Harry hated it there. The whole house smelled of cabbage and Mrs. Figg </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="613"></td>
        <td id="LC613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made him look at photographs of all the cats she’d ever owned. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="614"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="615"></td>
        <td id="LC615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Now what?” said Aunt Petunia, looking furiously at Harry as though he’d planned this. Harry </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="616"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="617"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="618"></td>
        <td id="LC618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and Tufty again. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="619"></td>
        <td id="LC619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="620"></td>
        <td id="LC620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We could phone Marge,” Uncle Vernon suggested. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="621"></td>
        <td id="LC621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="622"></td>
        <td id="LC622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Don’t be silly, Vernon, she hates the boy.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="623"></td>
        <td id="LC623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="624"></td>
        <td id="LC624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Dursleys often spoke about Harry like this, as though he wasn’t there — or rather, as though </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="625"></td>
        <td id="LC625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was something very nasty that couldn’t understand them, like a slug. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="626"></td>
        <td id="LC626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="627"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1100"></td>
        <td id="LC1100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Drive — </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1190"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1191"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1193"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1376"></td>
        <td id="LC1376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1377"></td>
        <td id="LC1377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Ah, shut up, Dursley, yeh great prune,” said the giant; he reached over the back of the sofa, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1378"></td>
        <td id="LC1378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">jerked the gun out of Uncle Vernon’s hands, bent it into a knot as easily as if it had been made of </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1379"></td>
        <td id="LC1379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rubber, and threw it into a corner of the room. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1380"></td>
        <td id="LC1380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1381"></td>
        <td id="LC1381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Uncle Vernon made another funny noise, like a mouse being trodden on. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1382"></td>
        <td id="LC1382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1383"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1477"></td>
        <td id="LC1477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yeh don’ know what yeh are?” he said finally. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1478"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L1479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1479"></td>
        <td id="LC1479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Uncle Vernon suddenly found his voice. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1480"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1482"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1570"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1572"></td>
        <td id="LC1572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We swore when we took him in we’d put a stop to that rubbish,” said Uncle Vernon, “swore </td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1756"></td>
        <td id="LC1756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He’s off ter the finest school of witchcraft and wizardry in the world. Seven years there and he </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1757"></td>
        <td id="LC1757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">won’t know himself. He’ll be with youngsters of his own sort, fer a change, an’ he’ll be under </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1758"></td>
        <td id="LC1758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the greatest headmaster Hogwarts ever had Albus Dumbled — ” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1759"></td>
        <td id="LC1759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1760"></td>
        <td id="LC1760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I AM NOT PAYING FOR SOME CRACKPOT OLD FOOL TO TEACH HIM MAGIC </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1761"></td>
        <td id="LC1761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">TRICKS!” yelled Uncle Vernon. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1762"></td>
        <td id="LC1762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1763"></td>
        <td id="LC1763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But he had finally gone too far. Hagrid seized his umbrella and whirled it over his head, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1764"></td>
        <td id="LC1764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“NEVER — ” he thundered, “— INSULT — ALBUS — DUMBLEDORE — IN — FRONT — </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1765"></td>
        <td id="LC1765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">OF — ME!” </td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1766"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1767"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1768"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1769"></td>
        <td id="LC1769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He brought the umbrella swishing down through the air to point at Dudley — there was a flash of </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1770"></td>
        <td id="LC1770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">violet light, a sound like a firecracker, a sharp squeal, and the next second, Dudley was dancing </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1771"></td>
        <td id="LC1771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on the spot with his hands clasped over his fat bottom, howling in pain. When he turned his back </td>

        <td id="L1772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1772"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1773"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="L1810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1810"></td>
        <td id="LC1810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Diagon Alley </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1811"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1812"></td>
        <td id="LC1812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry woke early the next morning. Although he could tell it was daylight, he kept his eyes shut </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1813"></td>
        <td id="LC1813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tight. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1814"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1815"></td>
        <td id="LC1815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was a dream, he told himself firmly. I dreamed a giant called Hagrid came to tell me I was </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1816"></td>
        <td id="LC1816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">going to a school for wizards. When I open my eyes I’ll be at home in my cupboard. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1817"></td>
        <td id="LC1817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1818"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1819"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1820"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1821"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1822"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1826"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1827"></td>
        <td id="LC1827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He sat up and Hagrid’ s heavy coat fell off him. The hut was full of sunlight, the stonn was over, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1828"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1829"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1830"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1831"></td>
        <td id="LC1831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry scrambled to his feet, so happy he felt as though a large balloon was swelling inside him. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1832"></td>
        <td id="LC1832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He went straight to the window and jerked it open. The owl swooped in and dropped the </td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1834"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1835"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1839"></td>
        <td id="LC1839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">savaging the coat. </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1840"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1842"></td>
        <td id="LC1842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1843"></td>
        <td id="LC1843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Pay him,” Hagrid grunted into the sofa. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1844"></td>
        <td id="LC1844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1845"></td>
        <td id="LC1845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What?” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1846"></td>
        <td id="LC1846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1847"></td>
        <td id="LC1847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He wants payin’ fer deliverin’ the paper. Look in the pockets.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1848"></td>
        <td id="LC1848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1849"></td>
        <td id="LC1849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hagrid’s coat seemed to be made of nothing but pockets — bunches of keys, slug pellets, balls of </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1850"></td>

        <td id="L1943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1943"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1944"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC2135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Told yeh, didn’t I? Told yeh you was famous. Even Professor Quirrell was tremblin’ ter meet </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2136"></td>
        <td id="LC2136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yeh — mind you, he’s usually tremblin’.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2137"></td>
        <td id="LC2137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2138"></td>
        <td id="LC2138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2139"></td>
        <td id="LC2139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Is he always that nervous?” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2140"></td>
        <td id="LC2140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2141"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2142"></td>
        <td id="LC2142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2143"></td>
        <td id="LC2143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh, yeah. Poor bloke. Brilliant mind. He was fine while he was studyin’ outta books but then he </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2144"></td>
        <td id="LC2144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">took a year off ter get some firsthand experience. . . They say he met vampires in the Black </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2145"></td>
        <td id="LC2145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Forest, and there was a nasty bit o’ trouble with a hag — never been the same since. Scared of </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2146"></td>
        <td id="LC2146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the students, scared of his own subject — now, where’s me umbrella?” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2147"></td>
        <td id="LC2147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2148"></td>
        <td id="LC2148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Vampires? Hags? Harry’s head was swimming. Hagrid, meanwhile, was counting bricks in the </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2149"></td>
        <td id="LC2149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wall above the trash can. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2150"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2151"></td>
        <td id="LC2151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Three up... two across...” he muttered. “Right, stand back, Harry.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2152"></td>
        <td id="LC2152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2153"></td>
        <td id="LC2153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He tapped the wall three times with the point of his umbrella. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2154"></td>
        <td id="LC2154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2155"></td>
        <td id="LC2155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The brick he had touched quivered — it wriggled — in the middle, a small hole appeared — it </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2156"></td>
        <td id="LC2156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grew wider and wider — a second later they were facing an archway large enough even for </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2157"></td>
        <td id="LC2157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hagrid, an archway onto a cobbled street that twisted and turned out of sight. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2158"></td>
        <td id="LC2158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2159"></td>
        <td id="LC2159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Welcome,” said Hagrid, “to Diagon Alley.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2160"></td>
        <td id="LC2160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2161"></td>
        <td id="LC2161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He grinned at Harry’s amazement. They stepped through the archway. Harry looked quickly over </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2162"></td>
        <td id="LC2162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his shoulder and saw the archway shrink instantly back into solid wall. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2163"></td>
        <td id="LC2163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2164"></td>
        <td id="LC2164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The sun shone brightly on a stack of cauldrons outside the nearest shop. Cauldrons — All Sizes </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2165"></td>
        <td id="LC2165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">— Copper, Brass, Pewter, Silver — Self-Stirring — Collapsible, said a sign hanging over them. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2166"></td>
        <td id="LC2166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2167"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2168"></td>
        <td id="LC2168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2169"></td>
        <td id="LC2169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry wished he had about eight more eyes. He turned his head in every direction as they walked </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2170"></td>
        <td id="LC2170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up the street, trying to look at everything at once: the shops, the things outside them, the people </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC2171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doing their shopping. A plump woman outside an Apothecary was shaking her head as they </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC2172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passed, saying, “Dragon liver, sixteen Sickles an ounce, they’re mad...” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2173"></td>
        <td id="LC2173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2174"></td>
        <td id="LC2174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A low, soft hooting came from a dark shop with a sign saying Eeylops Owl Emporium — </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2175"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2176"></td>
        <td id="LC2176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tawny, Screech, Barn, Brown, and Snowy. Several boys of about Harry’s age had their noses </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2177"></td>
        <td id="LC2177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pressed against a window with broomsticks in it. “Look,” Harry heard one of them say, “the new </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2178"></td>
        <td id="LC2178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nimbus Two Thousand — fastest ever — ” There were shops selling robes, shops selling </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2179"></td>
        <td id="LC2179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">telescopes and strange silver instruments Harry had never seen before, windows stacked with </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2180"></td>
        <td id="LC2180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">barrels of bat spleens and eels’ eyes, tottering piles of spell books, quills, and rolls of parchment, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2181"></td>
        <td id="LC2181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">potion bottles, globes of the moon. . . </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2182"></td>
        <td id="LC2182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2183"></td>
        <td id="LC2183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Gringotts,” said Hagrid. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2184"></td>
        <td id="LC2184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2185"></td>
        <td id="LC2185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They had reached a snowy white building that towered over the other little shops. Standing </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2186"></td>
        <td id="LC2186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beside its burnished bronze doors, wearing a uniform of scarlet and gold, was — </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2187"></td>
        <td id="LC2187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2188"></td>
        <td id="LC2188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yeah, that’s a goblin,” said Hagrid quietly as they walked up the white stone steps toward him. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2189"></td>
        <td id="LC2189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The goblin was about a head shorter than Harry. He had a swarthy, clever face, a pointed beard </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2190"></td>
        <td id="LC2190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2191"></td>
        <td id="LC2191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2192"></td>
        <td id="LC2192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2193"></td>
        <td id="LC2193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and, Harry noticed, very long fingers and feet. He bowed as they walked inside. Now they were </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2194"></td>
        <td id="LC2194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">facing a second pair of doors, silver this time, with words engraved upon them: </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2195"></td>
        <td id="LC2195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2196"></td>
        <td id="LC2196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Enter, stranger, but take heed </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2197"></td>
        <td id="LC2197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2198"></td>
        <td id="LC2198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of what awaits the sin of greed, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2199"></td>
        <td id="LC2199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2200"></td>
        <td id="LC2200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For those who take, but do not earn, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2201"></td>
        <td id="LC2201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2202"></td>
        <td id="LC2202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Must pay most dearly in their turn. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2203"></td>
        <td id="LC2203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2204"></td>
        <td id="LC2204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So if you seek beneath our floors </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2205"></td>
        <td id="LC2205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2206"></td>
        <td id="LC2206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A treasure that was never yours, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2207"></td>
        <td id="LC2207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2208"></td>
        <td id="LC2208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Thief, you have been warned, beware </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2209"></td>
        <td id="LC2209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2210"></td>
        <td id="LC2210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of finding more than treasure there. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2211"></td>
        <td id="LC2211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2212"></td>
        <td id="LC2212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Like I said, Yeh’d be mad ter try an’ rob it,” said Hagrid. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2213"></td>
        <td id="LC2213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2214"></td>
        <td id="LC2214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A pair of goblins bowed them through the silver doors and they were in a vast marble hall. About </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2215"></td>
        <td id="LC2215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a hundred more goblins were sitting on high stools behind a long counter, scribbling in large </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2216"></td>
        <td id="LC2216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ledgers, weighing coins in brass scales, examining precious stones through eyeglasses. There </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2217"></td>
        <td id="LC2217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were too many doors to count leading off the hall, and yet more goblins were showing people in </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2218"></td>
        <td id="LC2218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and out of these. Hagrid and Harry made for the counter. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2219"></td>
        <td id="LC2219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2220"></td>
        <td id="LC2220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Morning,” said Hagrid to a free goblin. “We’ve come ter take some money outta Mr. Harry </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2221"></td>
        <td id="LC2221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Potter’s safe.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2222"></td>
        <td id="LC2222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2223"></td>
        <td id="LC2223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You have his key, sir?” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2224"></td>
        <td id="LC2224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2225"></td>
        <td id="LC2225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Got it here somewhere,” said Hagrid, and he started emptying his pockets onto the counter, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2226"></td>
        <td id="LC2226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scattering a handful of moldy dog biscuits over the goblin’s book of numbers. The goblin </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2227"></td>
        <td id="LC2227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wrinkled his nose. Harry watched the goblin on their right weighing a pile of rubies as big as </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2228"></td>
        <td id="LC2228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">glowing coals. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2229"></td>
        <td id="LC2229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2230"></td>
        <td id="LC2230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Got it,” said Hagrid at last, holding up a tiny golden key. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2231"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2232"></td>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2318"></td>
        <td id="LC2318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Something really extraordinary had to be inside this top security vault, Harry was sure, and he </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2319"></td>
        <td id="LC2319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leaned forward eagerly, expecting to see fabulous jewels at the very least — but at first he </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2320"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2321"></td>
        <td id="LC2321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on the floor. Hagrid picked it up and tucked it deep inside his coat. Harry longed to know what it </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2322"></td>
        <td id="LC2322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was, but knew better than to ask. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2323"></td>
        <td id="LC2323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2324"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2417"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2506"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2507"></td>
        <td id="LC2507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Makers of Fine Wands since 382 B.C. A single wand lay on a faded purple cushion in the dusty </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2508"></td>
        <td id="LC2508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">window. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2509"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2510"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2512"></td>

</td>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2578"></td>
        <td id="LC2578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shoulder to floor, knee to annpit and round his head. As he measured, he said, “Every Ollivander </td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2579"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2580"></td>
        <td id="LC2580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feathers, and the heartstrings of dragons. No two Ollivander wands are the same, just as no two </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2581"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2591"></td>

        <td id="LC2592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it and give it a wave.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2593"></td>
        <td id="LC2593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2594"></td>
        <td id="LC2594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry took the wand and (feeling foolish) waved it around a bit, but Mr. Ollivander snatched it </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2595"></td>
        <td id="LC2595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out of his hand almost at once. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2596"></td>
        <td id="LC2596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2597"></td>
        <td id="LC2597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Maple and phoenix feather. Seven inches. Quite whippy. Try — ” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2598"></td>
        <td id="LC2598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2599"></td>
        <td id="LC2599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry tried — but he had hardly raised the wand when it, too, was snatched back by Mr. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2600"></td>
        <td id="LC2600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Ollivander. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2601"></td>
        <td id="LC2601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2602"></td>
        <td id="LC2602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No, no — here, ebony and unicorn hair, eight and a half inches, springy. Go on, go on, try it </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2688"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2689"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2690"></td>
        <td id="LC2690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry’s last month with the Dursleys wasn’t fun. True, Dudley was now so scared of Harry he </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2691"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC2692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cupboard, force him to do anything, or shout at him — in fact, they didn’t speak to him at all. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2693"></td>
        <td id="LC2693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Half terrified, half furious, they acted as though any chair with Harry in it were empty. Although </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2694"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2788"></td>

        <td id="L2789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2789"></td>
        <td id="LC2789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">station with a trunk he could hardly lift, a pocket full of wizard money, and a large owl. </td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC2880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2881"></td>
        <td id="LC2881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

        <td id="L3202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3202"></td>

        <td id="L3204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3204"></td>
        <td id="LC3204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CURRENTLY HEADMASTER OF HOGWARTS </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3205"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3206"></td>
        <td id="LC3206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Considered by many the greatest wizard of modern times, Dumbledore is particularly famous for </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3207"></td>

        <td id="LC3208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dragon ’s blood, and his work on alchemy with his partner, Nicolas Flamel. Professor </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3209"></td>
        <td id="LC3209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dumbledore enjoys chamber music and tenpin bowling. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3210"></td>

        <td id="L3233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3233"></td>
        <td id="LC3233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Bertie Bott’s Every Flavor Beans. </td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3235"></td>
        <td id="LC3235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You want to be careful with those,” Ron warned Harry. “When they say every flavor, they </td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

</td>

      </tr>

</td>

</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC3260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes,” said the boy miserably. “Well, if you see him. . .” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3261"></td>
        <td id="LC3261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3262"></td>
        <td id="LC3262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He left. </td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3450"></td>
        <td id="LC3450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I’ve heard of his family,” said Ron darkly. “They were some of the first to come back to our </td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3540"></td>
        <td id="LC3540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Sorting Hat </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3541"></td>
        <td id="LC3541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3542"></td>
        <td id="LC3542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The door swung open at once. A tall, black-haired witch in emerald-green robes stood there. She </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3543"></td>
        <td id="LC3543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had a very stern face and Harry’s first thought was that this was not someone to cross. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3544"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3545"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3546"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3635"></td>
        <td id="LC3635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry had never even imagined such a strange and splendid place. It was lit by thousands and </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3636"></td>
        <td id="LC3636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thousands of candles that were floating in midair over four long tables, where the rest of the </td>

        <td id="LC3826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry heard the hat shout the last word to the whole hall. He took off the hat and walked shakily </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3919"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4010"></td>
        <td id="LC4010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4011"></td>
        <td id="LC4011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the school bellowed: </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4012"></td>
        <td id="LC4012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4013"></td>
        <td id="LC4013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Hogwarts, Ho gw arts, Hoggv Warty Ho gw arts, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4015"></td>
        <td id="LC4015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Teach us something please, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4082"></td>
        <td id="LC4082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At the very end of the corridor hung a portrait of a very fat woman in a pink silk dress. </td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4086"></td>
        <td id="LC4086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They all scrambled through it — Neville needed a leg up — and found themselves in the </td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4097"></td>
        <td id="LC4097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry was going to ask Ron if he’d had any of the treacle tart, but he fell asleep almost at once. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4098"></td>
        <td id="LC4098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4099"></td>
        <td id="LC4099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Perhaps Harry had eaten a bit too much, because he had a very strange dream. He was wearing </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4100"></td>
        <td id="LC4100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Professor Quirrell’s turban, which kept talking to him, telling him he must transfer to Slytherin at </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4101"></td>
        <td id="LC4101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">once, because it was his destiny. Harry told the turban he didn’t want to be in Slytherin; it got </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4102"></td>
        <td id="LC4102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heavier and heavier; he tried to pull it off but it tightened painfully — and there was Malfoy, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4103"></td>
        <td id="LC4103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laughing at him as he struggled with it — then Malfoy turned into the hook-nosed teacher, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4104"></td>
        <td id="LC4104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4105"></td>
        <td id="LC4105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Snape, whose laugh became high and cold — there was a burst of green light and Harry woke, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4106"></td>
        <td id="LC4106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sweating and shaking. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4107"></td>
        <td id="LC4107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4108"></td>
        <td id="LC4108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He rolled over and fell asleep again, and when he woke next day, he didn’t remember the dream </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4109"></td>
        <td id="LC4109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at all. </td>

        <td id="L4110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4110"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4116"></td>

        <td id="L4118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4118"></td>
        <td id="LC4118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“There, look.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4119"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4120"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4121"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4123"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L4124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4124"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4125"></td>
        <td id="LC4125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4126"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4127"></td>

</td>
