      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4129"></td>
        <td id="LC4129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4130"></td>
        <td id="LC4130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Whispers followed Harry from the moment he left his dormitory the next day. People lining up </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4131"></td>
        <td id="LC4131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">outside classrooms stood on tiptoe to get a look at him, or doubled back to pass him in the </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4132"></td>
        <td id="LC4132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">corridors again, staring. Harry wished they wouldn’t, because he was trying to concentrate on </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4133"></td>
        <td id="LC4133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">finding his way to classes. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4134"></td>
        <td id="LC4134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4135"></td>
        <td id="LC4135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There were a hundred and forty-two staircases at Hogwarts: wide, sweeping ones; narrow, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4136"></td>
        <td id="LC4136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rickety ones; some that led somewhere different on a Friday; some with a vanishing step halfway </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4137"></td>
        <td id="LC4137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up that you had to remember to jump. Then there were doors that wouldn’t open unless you </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4138"></td>
        <td id="LC4138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">asked politely, or tickled them in exactly the right place, and doors that weren’t really doors at </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4139"></td>
        <td id="LC4139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all, but solid walls just pretending. It was also very hard to remember where anything was, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4140"></td>
        <td id="LC4140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because it all seemed to move around a lot. The people in the portraits kept going to visit each </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4141"></td>
        <td id="LC4141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other, and Harry was sure the coats of armor could walk. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4142"></td>
        <td id="LC4142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4143"></td>
        <td id="LC4143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The ghosts didn’t help, either. It was always a nasty shock when one of them glided suddenly </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4144"></td>
        <td id="LC4144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through a door you were trying to open. Nearly Headless Nick was always happy to point new </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4145"></td>
        <td id="LC4145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Gryffindors in the right direction, but Peeves the Poltergeist was worth two locked doors and a </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4146"></td>
        <td id="LC4146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trick staircase if you met him when you were late for class. He would drop wastepaper baskets </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4147"></td>
        <td id="LC4147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on your head, pull rugs from under your feet, pelt you with bits of chalk, or sneak up behind you, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4148"></td>
        <td id="LC4148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">invisible, grab your nose, and screech, “GOT YOUR CONK!” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4149"></td>
        <td id="LC4149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4150"></td>
        <td id="LC4150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Even worse than Peeves, if that was possible, was the caretaker, Argus Filch. Harry and Ron </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4151"></td>
        <td id="LC4151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">managed to get on the wrong side of him on their very first morning. Filch found them trying to </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4152"></td>
        <td id="LC4152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">force their way through a door that unluckily turned out to be the entrance to the out-of-bounds </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4153"></td>
        <td id="LC4153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">corridor on the third floor. He wouldn’t believe they were lost, was sure they were trying to </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4154"></td>
        <td id="LC4154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">break into it on purpose, and was threatening to lock them in the dungeons when they were </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4155"></td>
        <td id="LC4155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rescued by Professor Quirrell, who was passing. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4156"></td>
        <td id="LC4156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4157"></td>
        <td id="LC4157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Filch owned a cat called Mrs. Norris, a scrawny, dust-colored creature with bulging, lamp like </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4158"></td>
        <td id="LC4158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eyes just like Filch’s. She patrolled the corridors alone. Break a rule in front of her, put just one </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4159"></td>
        <td id="LC4159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4160"></td>
        <td id="LC4160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4161"></td>
        <td id="LC4161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4162"></td>
        <td id="LC4162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">toe out of line, and she’d whisk off for Filch, who’d appear, wheezing, two seconds later. Filch </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4163"></td>
        <td id="LC4163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knew the secret passageways of the school better than anyone (except perhaps the Weasley </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4164"></td>
        <td id="LC4164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">twins) and could pop up as suddenly as any of the ghosts. The students all hated him, and it was </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4165"></td>
        <td id="LC4165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the dearest ambition of many to give Mrs. Norris a good kick. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4166"></td>
        <td id="LC4166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4167"></td>
        <td id="LC4167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And then, once you had managed to find them, there were the classes themselves. There was a </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4168"></td>
        <td id="LC4168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lot more to magic, as Harry quickly found out, than waving your wand and saying a few funny </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4169"></td>
        <td id="LC4169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">words. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4170"></td>
        <td id="LC4170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4171"></td>
        <td id="LC4171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They had to study the night skies through their telescopes every Wednesday at midnight and </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4172"></td>
        <td id="LC4172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">learn the names of different stars and the movements of the planets. Three times a week they </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4173"></td>
        <td id="LC4173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">went out to the greenhouses behind the castle to study Herbology, with a dumpy little witch </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4174"></td>
        <td id="LC4174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">called Professor Sprout, where they learned how to take care of all the strange plants and fungi, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4175"></td>
        <td id="LC4175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and found out what they were used for. Easily the most boring class was History of Magic, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4176"></td>
        <td id="LC4176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which was the only one taught by a ghost. Professor Binns had been very old indeed when he </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4177"></td>
        <td id="LC4177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had fallen asleep in front of the staff room fire and got up next morning to teach, leaving his </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4178"></td>
        <td id="LC4178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">body behind him. Binns droned on and on while they scribbled down names and dates, and got </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4179"></td>
        <td id="LC4179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Emetic the Evil and Uric the Oddball mixed up. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4180"></td>
        <td id="LC4180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4181"></td>
        <td id="LC4181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Professor Flitwick, the Charms teacher, was a tiny little wizard who had to stand on a pile of </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4182"></td>
        <td id="LC4182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">books to see over his desk. At the start of their first class he took the roll call, and when he </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4183"></td>
        <td id="LC4183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reached Harry’s name he gave an excited squeak and toppled out of sight. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4184"></td>
        <td id="LC4184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4185"></td>
        <td id="LC4185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Professor McGonagall was again different. Harry had been quite right to think she wasn’t a </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4186"></td>
        <td id="LC4186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">teacher to cross. Strict and clever, she gave them a talking-to the moment they sat down in her </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4187"></td>
        <td id="LC4187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first class. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4188"></td>
        <td id="LC4188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4189"></td>
        <td id="LC4189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Transfiguration is some of the most complex and dangerous magic you will leam at Hogwarts,” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4190"></td>
        <td id="LC4190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she said. “Anyone messing around in my class will leave and not come back. You have been </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4191"></td>
        <td id="LC4191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">warned.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4192"></td>
        <td id="LC4192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4193"></td>
        <td id="LC4193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then she changed her desk into a pig and back again. They were all very impressed and couldn’t </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4194"></td>
        <td id="LC4194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wait to get started, but soon realized they weren’t going to be changing the furniture into animals </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4195"></td>
        <td id="LC4195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for a long time. After taking a lot of complicated notes, they were each given a match and started </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4196"></td>
        <td id="LC4196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trying to turn it into a needle. By the end of the lesson, only Hermione Granger had made any </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4197"></td>
        <td id="LC4197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">difference to her match; Professor McGonagall showed the class how it had gone all silver and </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4198"></td>
        <td id="LC4198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pointy and gave Hermione a rare smile. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4199"></td>
        <td id="LC4199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4200"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4291"></td>
        <td id="LC4291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">

      <tr>
        <td id="L4755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4755"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4756"></td>
        <td id="LC4756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“ — a century,” said Harry, shoveling pie into his mouth. He felt particularly hungry after the </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4757"></td>
        <td id="LC4757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">excitement of the afternoon. “Wood told me.” </td>

        <td id="L5116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5116"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5128"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5129"></td>
        <td id="LC5129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5130"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5132"></td>
        <td id="LC5132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5133"></td>
        <td id="LC5133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hennione was now refusing to speak to Harry and Ron, but she was such a bossy know-it-all that </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5134"></td>
        <td id="LC5134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they saw this as an added bonus. All they really wanted now was a way of getting back at </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5135"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5227"></td>
        <td id="LC5227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5315"></td>
        <td id="LC5315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fifty points, so they nearly always win. That’s why Seekers get fouled so much. A game of </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5316"></td>
        <td id="LC5316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Quidditch only ends when the Snitch is caught, so it can go on for ages — I think the record is </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5317"></td>
        <td id="LC5317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">three months, they had to keep bringing on substitutes so the players could get some sleep. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5318"></td>
        <td id="LC5318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5319"></td>
        <td id="LC5319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, that’s it any questions?” </td>

        <td id="LC5320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5603"></td>
        <td id="LC5603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against the rules, and here she was, pretending she had, to get them out of trouble. It was as if </td>

        <td id="L5665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5665"></td>

        <td id="L5679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5679"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5681"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5686"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5689"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC5690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Library books are not to be taken outside the school,” said Snape. “Give it to me. Five points </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5691"></td>
        <td id="LC5691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from Gryffindor.” </td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5692"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5695"></td>
        <td id="LC5695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He’s just made that rule up,” Harry muttered angrily as Snape limped away. “Wonder what’s </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5696"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6073"></td>
        <td id="LC6073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“So why did he just try and kill Harry?” cried Hennione. </td>

        <td id="LC6097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Christmas was coming. One morning in mid-December, Hogwarts woke to find itself covered in </td>
      </tr>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC6163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">McGonagall and Professor Flitwick were busy with the Christmas decorations. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6164"></td>
        <td id="LC6164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC6539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reflected them, invisible or not? </td>

        <td id="L6542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6542"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6632"></td>
        <td id="LC6632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No — I’m alone — but I’m different — I look older — and I’m head boy!” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6633"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC6637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Quidditch cup — I’m Quidditch captain, too.” </td>

</td>

        <td id="L6724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6724"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6725"></td>
        <td id="LC6725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I don’t need a cloak to become invisible,” said Dumbledore gently. “Now, can you think what </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6726"></td>
        <td id="LC6726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Mirror of Erised shows us all?” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6727"></td>
        <td id="LC6727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6728"></td>
        <td id="LC6728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6729"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC6734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nonnal mirror, that is, he would look into it and see himself exactly as he is. Does that help?” </td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6818"></td>
        <td id="LC6818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6822"></td>
        <td id="LC6822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="L7099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7099"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7100"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7101"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L7381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7381"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L7473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7473"></td>
        <td id="LC7473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It’s Hedwig!” said Harry, hurrying to let her in. “She’ll have Charlie’s answer!” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7651"></td>
        <td id="LC7651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I think I’ve got a good idea of what’s been going on,” said Professor McGonagall. “It doesn’t </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7652"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7656"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC7657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Neville was looking stunned and hurt. Poor, blundering Neville — Harry knew what it must have </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC7658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cost him to try and find them in the dark, to warn them. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7659"></td>
        <td id="LC7659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7660"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7935"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7936"></td>
        <td id="LC7936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away. </td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8031"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC8215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Snape wants the stone for Voldemort. . . and Voldemort’s waiting in the forest. . . and all this </td>
      </tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8780"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8781"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L8782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8782"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8783"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="L8868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8868"></td>
        <td id="LC8868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Ron examined the lock on the door. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8869"></td>
        <td id="LC8869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8870"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8871"></td>
        <td id="LC8871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8872"></td>
        <td id="LC8872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They each seized a broomstick and kicked off into the air, soaring into the midst of the cloud of </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8873"></td>
        <td id="LC8873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">keys. They grabbed and snatched, but the bewitched keys darted and dived so quickly it was </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8874"></td>
        <td id="LC8874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">almost impossible to catch one. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8875"></td>
        <td id="LC8875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8876"></td>
        <td id="LC8876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Not for nothing, though, was Harry the youngest Seeker in a century. He had a knack for spotting </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8877"></td>
        <td id="LC8877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things other people didn’t. After a minute’s weaving about through the whirl of rainbow feathers, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8878"></td>
        <td id="LC8878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he noticed a large silver key that had a bent wing, as if it had already been caught and stuffed </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8879"></td>
        <td id="LC8879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">roughly into the keyhole. </td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8880"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8881"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8882"></td>
        <td id="LC8882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">— the feathers are all crumpled on one side.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8883"></td>
        <td id="LC8883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8884"></td>
        <td id="LC8884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Ron went speeding in the direction that Harry was pointing, crashed into the ceiling, and nearly </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8885"></td>
        <td id="LC8885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fell off his broom. </td>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8888"></td>
        <td id="LC8888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wing. “Ron, you come at it from above — Hennione, stay below and stop it from going down </td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L8950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8950"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8954"></td>

        <td id="L8955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8955"></td>

        <td id="L8956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8956"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8957"></td>
        <td id="LC8957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Ron started to direct the black pieces. They moved silently wherever he sent them. Harry’s knees </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8958"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8959"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8961"></td>
        <td id="LC8961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8962"></td>
        <td id="LC8962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Their first real shock came when their other knight was taken. The white queen smashed him to </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8963"></td>
        <td id="LC8963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the floor and dragged him off the board, where he lay quite still, facedown. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8964"></td>
        <td id="LC8964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8965"></td>
        <td id="LC8965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Had to let that happen,” said Ron, looking shaken. “Leaves you free to take that bishop, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8966"></td>
        <td id="LC8966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hennione, go on.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8967"></td>
        <td id="LC8967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8968"></td>
        <td id="LC8968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Every time one of their men was lost, the white pieces showed no mercy. Soon there was a </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8969"></td>
        <td id="LC8969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">huddle of limp black players slumped along the wall. Twice, Ron only just noticed in time that </td>

        <td id="LC8970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry and Hennione were in danger. He himself darted around the board, taking almost as many </td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9055"></td>
        <td id="LC9055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

        <td id="L9057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9057"></td>
        <td id="LC9057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9058"></td>
        <td id="LC9058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Two among our number hold only nettle wine, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9059"></td>
        <td id="LC9059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9060"></td>
        <td id="LC9060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Three of us are killers, waiting bidden in line. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9061"></td>
        <td id="LC9061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9062"></td>
        <td id="LC9062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Choose, unless you wish to stay here forevermore, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9063"></td>
        <td id="LC9063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9064"></td>
        <td id="LC9064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To help you in your choice, we give you these clues four: </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9065"></td>
        <td id="LC9065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9066"></td>
        <td id="LC9066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">First, however slyly the poison tries to hide </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9067"></td>
        <td id="LC9067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9068"></td>
        <td id="LC9068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You will always find some on nettle wine ’s left side; </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9069"></td>
        <td id="LC9069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9070"></td>
        <td id="LC9070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Second, different are those who stand at either end, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9071"></td>
        <td id="LC9071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9072"></td>
        <td id="LC9072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But if you would move onward, neither is your friend; </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9073"></td>
        <td id="LC9073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9074"></td>
        <td id="LC9074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Third, as you see clearly, all are different size, </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9075"></td>
        <td id="LC9075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9076"></td>
        <td id="LC9076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Neither dwarf nor giant holds death in their insides; </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9077"></td>
        <td id="LC9077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9078"></td>
        <td id="LC9078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Fourth, the second left and the second on the right </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9079"></td>
        <td id="LC9079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9080"></td>
        <td id="LC9080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Are twins once you taste them, though different at first sight. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9081"></td>
        <td id="LC9081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9082"></td>
        <td id="LC9082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hennione let out a great sigh and Harry, amazed, saw that she was smiling, the very last thing he </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9083"></td>
        <td id="LC9083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">felt like doing. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9084"></td>
        <td id="LC9084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9085"></td>
        <td id="LC9085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“ Brilliant ,” said Hermione. “This isn’t magic — it’s logic — a puzzle. A lot of the greatest </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9086"></td>
        <td id="LC9086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wizards haven’t got an ounce of logic, they’d be stuck in here forever.” </td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9087"></td>
        <td id="LC9087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9088"></td>
        <td id="LC9088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But so will we, won’t we?” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9089"></td>
        <td id="LC9089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9090"></td>
        <td id="LC9090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Of course not,” said Hermione. “Everything we need is here on this paper. Seven bottles: three </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9091"></td>
        <td id="LC9091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9092"></td>
        <td id="LC9092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9093"></td>
        <td id="LC9093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9094"></td>
        <td id="LC9094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are poison; two are wine; one will get us safely through the black fire, and one will get us back </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9095"></td>
        <td id="LC9095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through the purple.” </td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9096"></td>
        <td id="LC9096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9097"></td>
        <td id="LC9097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But how do we know which to drink?” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9098"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9099"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9101"></td>
        <td id="LC9101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hennione read the paper several times. Then she walked up and down the line of bottles, </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9102"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9103"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9105"></td>
        <td id="LC9105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

        <td id="L9106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9106"></td>
        <td id="LC9106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry looked at the tiny bottle. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9107"></td>
        <td id="LC9107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9108"></td>
        <td id="LC9108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“There’s only enough there for one of us,” he said. “That’s hardly one swallow.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9109"></td>
        <td id="LC9109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9110"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9111"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC9112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Which one will get you back through the purple flames?” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9113"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC9114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hennione pointed at a rounded bottle at the right end of the line. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9115"></td>
        <td id="LC9115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9116"></td>
        <td id="LC9116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You drink that,” said Harry. “No, listen, get back and get Ron. Grab brooms from the flying- </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9117"></td>
        <td id="LC9117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">key room, they’ll get you out of the trapdoor and past Fluffy — go straight to the owlery and </td>

        <td id="LC9118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">send Hedwig to Dumbledore, we need him. I might be able to hold Snape off for a while, but I’m </td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9124"></td>
        <td id="LC9124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hennione’s lip trembled, and she suddenly dashed at Harry and threw her arms around him. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9125"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9126"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC9129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I’m not as good as you,” said Harry, very embarrassed, as she let go of him. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9130"></td>
        <td id="LC9130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

        <td id="L9131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9131"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC9132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and bravery and — oh Harry — be careful! ” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9133"></td>
        <td id="LC9133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9134"></td>
        <td id="LC9134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You drink first,” said Harry. “You are sure which is which, aren’t you?” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9135"></td>
        <td id="LC9135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9136"></td>
        <td id="LC9136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Positive,” said Hennione. She took a long drink from the round bottle at the end, and </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9137"></td>
        <td id="LC9137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shuddered. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9138"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9139"></td>
        <td id="LC9139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9140"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9141"></td>
        <td id="LC9141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It’s not poison?” said Harry anxiously. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9142"></td>
        <td id="LC9142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L9150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9150"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9151"></td>
        <td id="LC9151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hennione turned and walked straight through the purple fire. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9152"></td>
        <td id="LC9152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9153"></td>
        <td id="LC9153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry took a deep breath and picked up the smallest bottle. He turned to face the black flames. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9154"></td>
        <td id="LC9154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Here I come,” he said, and he drained the little bottle in one gulp. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9155"></td>
        <td id="LC9155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9156"></td>
        <td id="LC9156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was indeed as though ice was flooding his body. He put the bottle down and walked forward; </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9157"></td>
        <td id="LC9157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he braced himself, saw the black flames licking his body, but couldn’t feel them — for a moment </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9158"></td>
        <td id="LC9158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he could see nothing but dark fire — then he was on the other side, in the last chamber. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9159"></td>
        <td id="LC9159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9160"></td>
        <td id="LC9160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was already someone there — but it wasn’t Snape. It wasn’t even Voldemort. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9161"></td>
        <td id="LC9161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9162"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9167"></td>
        <td id="LC9167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Man With Two Faces </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9168"></td>
        <td id="LC9168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9169"></td>
        <td id="LC9169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was Quirrell. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9170"></td>
        <td id="LC9170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9171"></td>
        <td id="LC9171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You!” gasped Harry. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9172"></td>
        <td id="LC9172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9173"></td>
        <td id="LC9173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Quirrell smiled. His face wasn’t twitching at all. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9174"></td>
        <td id="LC9174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9175"></td>
        <td id="LC9175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Me,” he said calmly. “I wondered whether I’d be meeting you here, Potter.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9176"></td>
        <td id="LC9176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9177"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9178"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9179"></td>
        <td id="LC9179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Severus?” Quirrell laughed, and it wasn’t his usual quivering treble, either, but cold and sharp. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9180"></td>
        <td id="LC9180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, Severus does seem the type, doesn’t he? So useful to have him swooping around like an </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9181"></td>
        <td id="LC9181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">overgrown bat. Next to him, who would suspect p-p-poor, st-stuttering P-Professor Quirrell?” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9182"></td>
        <td id="LC9182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9183"></td>
        <td id="LC9183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry couldn’t take it in. This couldn’t be true, it couldn’t. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9184"></td>
        <td id="LC9184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9185"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9186"></td>
        <td id="LC9186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9187"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9188"></td>
        <td id="LC9188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rushed to set fire to Snape at that Quidditch match. She broke my eye contact with you. Another </td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9190"></td>
        <td id="LC9190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hadn’t been muttering a countercurse, trying to save you.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9191"></td>
        <td id="LC9191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9192"></td>
        <td id="LC9192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Snape was trying to save me?” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9193"></td>
        <td id="LC9193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9194"></td>
        <td id="LC9194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Of course,” said Quirrell coolly. “Why do you think he wanted to referee your next match? He </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9195"></td>
        <td id="LC9195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was trying to make sure I didn’t do it again. Funny, really. . . he needn’t have bothered. I couldn’t </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9196"></td>
        <td id="LC9196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do anything with Dumbledore watching. All the other teachers thought Snape was trying to stop </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9197"></td>
        <td id="LC9197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Gryffindor from winning, he did make himself unpopular. . . and what a waste of time, when after </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9198"></td>
        <td id="LC9198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all that, I’m going to kill you tonight.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9199"></td>
        <td id="LC9199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9200"></td>
        <td id="LC9200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Quirrell snapped his fingers. Ropes sprang out of thin air and wrapped themselves tightly around </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9201"></td>
        <td id="LC9201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Harry. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9202"></td>
        <td id="LC9202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9203"></td>
        <td id="LC9203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You’re too nosy to live, Potter. Scurrying around the school on Halloween like that, for all I </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9204"></td>
        <td id="LC9204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knew you’d seen me coming to look at what was guarding the Stone.” </td>

      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L9206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9206"></td>
        <td id="LC9206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">u You let the troll in?” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9207"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L9209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9209"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC9215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leg off properly. </td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L9218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9218"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9220"></td>
        <td id="LC9220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Erised. </td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9222"></td>
        <td id="LC9222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“This mirror is the key to finding the Stone,” Quirrell murmured, tapping his way around the </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9223"></td>
        <td id="LC9223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">frame. “Trust Dumbledore to come up with something like this. . . but he’s in London. . . I’ll be </td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9224"></td>
        <td id="LC9224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">far away by the time he gets back. . .” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9225"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9226"></td>
        <td id="LC9226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">All Harry could think of doing was to keep Quirrell talking and stop him from concentrating on </td>
      </tr>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9230"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

</td>

</td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9243"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9245"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9247"></td>

        <td id="L9248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9248"></td>
        <td id="LC9248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9249"></td>
        <td id="LC9249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lor the first time, a spasm of fear flitted across Quirrell’s face. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9250"></td>
        <td id="LC9250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9251"></td>
        <td id="LC9251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Sometimes,” he said, “I find it hard to follow my master’s instructions — he is a great wizard </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9252"></td>
        <td id="LC9252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I am weak — ” </td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9253"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9254"></td>
        <td id="LC9254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You mean he was there in the classroom with you?” Harry gasped. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9255"></td>
        <td id="LC9255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9256"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L9532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9532"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9534"></td>
        <td id="LC9534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But why couldn’t Quirrell touch me?” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9535"></td>
        <td id="LC9535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9536"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9815"></td>
        <td id="LC9815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">everything in life. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9816"></td>
        <td id="LC9816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9817"></td>
        <td id="LC9817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And suddenly, their wardrobes were empty, their trunks were packed, Neville’s toad was found </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9818"></td>
        <td id="LC9818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lurking in a corner of the toilets; notes were handed out to all students, warning them not to use </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9819"></td>
        <td id="LC9819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">magic over the holidays (“I always hope they’ll forget to give us these,” said Fred Weasley </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9820"></td>
        <td id="LC9820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sadly); Hagrid was there to take them down to the fleet of boats that sailed across the lake; they </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9821"></td>
        <td id="LC9821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were boarding the Hogwarts Express; talking and laughing as the countryside became greener </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9822"></td>
        <td id="LC9822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and tidier; eating Bettie Bott’s Every Flavor Beans as they sped past Muggle towns; pulling off </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9823"></td>
        <td id="LC9823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their wizard robes and putting on jackets and coats; pulling into platform nine and three-quarters </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9824"></td>
        <td id="LC9824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at King’s Cross Station. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9825"></td>
        <td id="LC9825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9826"></td>
        <td id="LC9826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It took quite a while for them all to get off the platfonn. A wizened old guard was up by the </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9827"></td>
        <td id="LC9827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ticket barrier, letting them go through the gate in twos and threes so they didn’t attract attention </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9828"></td>
        <td id="LC9828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by all bursting out of a solid wall at once and alarming the Muggles. </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9829"></td>
        <td id="LC9829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9830"></td>
        <td id="LC9830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You must come and stay this summer,” said Ron, “both of you — I’ll send you an owl.” </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9831"></td>
        <td id="LC9831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9832"></td>
        <td id="LC9832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Thanks,” said Harry, “I’ll need something to look forward to.” People jostled them as they </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9833"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L9834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9834"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9835"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9840"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9841"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9842"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L9844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9844"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="L9871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9871"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L9872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9872"></td>

        <td id="LC9879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Vernon, shocked that anyone could be so unpleasant. </td>
      </tr>

</td>

        <li><a data-ga-click="Footer, go to about, text:about" href="https://github.com/about">About</a></li>

    </ul>
  </div>
  <div class="d-flex flex-justify-center pb-6">
    <span class="f6 text-gray-light"></span>
  </div>
</div>
